Summary: It was scary, People were crying. There was a big boom
divs: Sighting DetailsWell... I was on my way home from a birthday party, and I looked up in the sky and I saw a shooting star. I looked at it longer. Something was wrong. It wasn't shooting. So I grabed ny camera and took a picture. I still have the picture. It looked like a triangular disc hovering for about 15 minutes in the air. It had three lites on the bottom that were always on. Now I know no man made aircraft can hover in one place for at least 15 minutes. If you want the picture, mail me saying you want to have it. There was also a big boom and then it was gone.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Alexandria, Frankton
This sighting has never been favorited.
